blogPosts.title: IDEATION
blogPosts.content: We have conceived a preliminary idea for a second-hand auction platform that differs from other platforms. In this platform, auction winners are not determined based on the bidding price, but rather by their secondary design proposals for a specific piece of clothing. The item is then given for free to the selected bidder with the winning design proposal.

blogPosts.title: Sustainability in Fashion
blogPosts.content: How sustainable practices are transforming the fashion industry. A guide for eco-conscious shoppers.
